description: Allows you to change your chat nickname
Returns all available information about the user
Changes your status to away with the message. If {message} is omitted, the away status is removed
Brings back to online if the user was away.
Sends an action message to the current channel or private window
Sends notice with shake animation to the user. If {nick} is omitted, it will be sent to all users
Allows you to set the channel topic
Returns usage and description about command. If {command} is omitted, return all available commands
Disconnects you from chat. Aliases: disconnect, offline, exit
Returns information about server build number
Search for any gif animation by query term
